alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 7:04PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Flagler County through 745 PM EDT... At 704 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Andalusia, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, pea size hail, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Marineland, Crescent Beach, Beverly Beach and Espanola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
